channel.title: Few errors

item.title: Few errors
item.dc:creator: @opticrs opticrs
item.description:
@opticrs wrote:

Tutorial:

for (int j = 0; j < toRemove.size; j++)) {

tried that it brings up
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:188: error: ‘)’ expected
(int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.pla
yers.length; j++) {
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:188: error: > expected
(int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.pla
yers.length; j++) {

       ^

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:188: error: not a statement
(int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.pla
yers.length; j++) {
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:188: error: ‘;’ expected
(int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.pla
yers.length; j++) {

            ^

src\server\world\ItemHandler.java:124: error: illegal start of expression
for (int j = 0; j < toRemove.size; j++)) {
^
src\server\world\ItemHandler.java:125: error: ‘;’ expected
GroundItem i = toRemove.get(j)
^
src\server\world\ItemHandler.java:175: error: ‘(’ expected
for int j = 0; (j < itemAmount; j++) {
^
src\server\world\ItemHandler.java:175: error: ‘)’ expected
for int j = 0; (j < itemAmount; j++) {
^
